title: Chapter 2066 - Chapter 2066: The Canyon That Can’T Be Entered
body:
Chapter 2066 - Chapter 2066: The Canyon That Can’T Be Entered

Chapter 2066: The canyon that can’t be entered

Translator: 549690339

“Get lost!”

Lu Ming shouted. Xie nianqing was lying in the eternal demonic coffin. He was determined to get his hands on the coffin.

Lu Ming waved the stone sword and launched a storm of attacks at the black-robed Emperor.

The black-robed Emperor was forced back again.

Just as Lu Ming thought that he had a chance to put away the eternal demonic coffin, the space at the top of the mountain cracked open all of a sudden. A figure appeared out of nowhere. His entire body was covered in demonic light, and his appearance could not be seen clearly. With a wave of his hand, a huge hand formed and grabbed at the eternal demonic coffin.

“Get lost!”

Lu Ming abandoned the black-robed Emperor and stomped on the ground. His huge body rushed toward the figure that had suddenly appeared. At the same time, he slashed out with his stone sword.

BOOM!

The sword light shattered the giant hand, but it didn’t stop and continued to attack the opponent.

The other party could only block and collide with the stone sword.

BOOM!

The figure took a few steps back, and the demonic light covering his body shook, revealing his true appearance.

“Undying Emperor!”

Lu Ming’s eyes narrowed!

This expert who had suddenly appeared was actually the undying Emperor of the undying demon nation.

undying Emperor wants the ancient demon nation’s national treasure, the ancient demon coffin!

Lu Ming’s heart skipped a beat as he guessed undying Emperor’s intention.

Buzzzzzz!

The undying Emperor didn’t want to fight with Lu Ming. He turned into more than a dozen figures and rushed toward the ancient demonic coffin from all directions.

It was impossible to tell which one was real from which one was fake. It was as if every single one of them was real.

“Don’t even think about it!”

Lu Ming shouted in his heart and controlled the golems. The golems ‘bodies shrunk rapidly, becoming the size of ordinary people.

Lu Ming’s speed increased dramatically after he turned into the size of a normal person. He took a step forward and rushed towards the ancient demonic coffin. At the same time, he slashed out more than ten sword lights towards the undying Emperor’s shadows.

Bang!

The undying Emperor’s dozen figures attacked at the same time. They displayed their terrifying combat strength and crushed Lu Ming’s sword radiance.

Just as Lu Ming was about to reach the ancient demonic coffin, the black-robed Emperor appeared again and blocked him.

The three of them were caught in a chaotic battle.

Lu Ming and the undying Emperor wanted to take the eternal demonic coffin while the black-robed Emperor wanted to protect it. The three of them were engaged in an intense battle.

Lu Ming was furious. He completely ignored his own defense. The energy in the golem burst out wildly and suppressed the other two people for a moment.

But this way, the golems ‘energy consumption was also shocking, they could not last for too long.

“Don’t even think about it!”

The black-robed Emperor roared in a hoarse voice. He took Lu Ming’s attack head-on at the risk of being injured and retreated back to the eternal demonic coffin.

Thump!

At the same time, he struck out a move at the ancient demonic coffin, causing it to fly out.

In that direction, there was a pitch-black Canyon that was filled with demonic Qi.

The ancient demon coffin flew into the valley and disappeared.

“The ancient demonic coffin is mine!”

Undying Emperor charged into the canyon.

However, just as he was about to rush in, he was stopped by a force. Then, undying Emperor’s body was blown out.

As for Lu Ming, he also rushed towards the canyon!

BOOM!

At the entrance of the canyon, Lu Ming seemed to have hit a wall. There was a force that stopped him.

Lu Ming frantically unleashed the power within the golems but it was useless. He was blocked by that force and could not charge in at all.

Moreover, there was an extremely powerful force in the canyon that rushed toward Lu Ming. Even the power of the golems could not withstand it and Lu Ming was pushed back.

those above the rank of martial Supreme can’t enter. Those below the rank of martial supreme will never be able to come out after entering!

The black-robed Emperor sneered.

However, Lu Ming did not seem to hear him. He took a step forward and rushed toward the canyon.

When he was about to reach the entrance of the canyon, the stone golem glowed and suddenly disappeared. Lu Ming’s original body appeared.

With a swish, Lu Ming dashed into the canyon and disappeared.

“Below the rank of a martial Supreme!”

The black-robed Emperor blurted out before sneering.”Those below the rank of martial Supreme may be able to enter, but they will never be able to come out!”

“Damn it!”

Undying Emperor roared and charged into the canyon again. Black robe didn’t stop him.

This time, undying Emperor didn’t make it into the canyon. He was sent flying out by a force.

BOOM!

A violent boom came from the sky. Then, two beams of light rushed over and two figures appeared.

They were the ancient Emperor and the black-robed Emperor.

The two black-robed emperors gathered together.

The ancient Emperor glared at the undying Emperor coldly. “Even if I’m not dead, you’re still here for the ancient demon coffin?”

brother Ancient One, you couldn’t even protect your own treasure properly, and it was stolen by someone else. I’m here to help you retrieve it!

The undying Emperor sneered.

“You don’t have to worry!”

The ancient Emperor said coldly. He then looked at the canyon and walked towards it.

The two black-robed emperors stood to the side without any intention of stopping him.

However, just like undying Emperor, the ancient Emperor couldn’t enter and was sent flying out.

“You can’t go in, please go back!”

A black-robed Emperor said.

“You guys stole my ancient demonic coffin. Are you not going to hand it over?”

The ancient Emperor’s eyes were as cold as ice.

of course it’s useful. Besides, I can’t give it to you even if I wanted to. Those above martial Supreme can’t enter, and those below martial Supreme can’t come out even if they enter!

A black-robed Emperor sneered.

“Anyone below the rank of martial Supreme can’t come out?”

The ancient Emperor frowned.

so, please go back. Don’t think about letting anyone below the rank of a martial Supreme enter. This place is our tribe’s Holy Land. No one is allowed to enter!

A black-robed Emperor spoke, and the two of them stood in front of the canyon.

“Haha, this is your business, 1 won’t get involved!”

The undying Emperor laughed. Although he couldn’t get the ancient demonic coffin, it wasn’t his anyway.

On the other hand, the ancient Emperor had lost his ancient demonic coffin and suffered a huge loss.

The undying Emperor laughed and tore the space apart.

The ancient Emperor looked at the canyon with a look of unwillingness. He then rushed into the sky and shouted,” “Stop! Leave this place!”

“Stop!”

The black-robed Emperor ordered.

Instantly, the people from both sides stopped fighting and rushed into the sky. He walked to the side of the ancient Emperor.

“The great emperor and the Azure Demon King were killed by Lu Ming!”

One of the true emperors reported to the ancient Emperor.

“I know, Cang Demon King only has himself to blame!”

The ancient Emperor nodded his head with a cold look in his eyes.

&Nbsp; although he had been fighting with the enemy, he had still been paying attention to the situation below, so he naturally knew what had happened.

He was shocked that Lu Ming had a terrifying treasure like the celestial Thearch’s body. Moreover, the Cang Demon King had gone too far. He deserved to be killed by Lu Ming..
